title: Cloud Atlas - A David Mitchell Novel.epub
description: The narrators hear their echoes in history and change their destinies in ways great and small, in a study of humanity's dangerous will to power. A reluctant voyager crosses the Pacific in 1850. A disinherited composer gatecrashes in between-wars Belgium. A vanity publisher flees gangland creditors. Finally, a young Pacific Islander witnesses the nightfall of science and civilization.
